article.class: post-633 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

p.a: If you are NOT on REMIND, sign up HERE to receive school updates.
4/1/20 – Superintendent Letter Update (Most Updated School Closure Information)
COVID-19 Stop the Spread of Germs

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-562 pum-theme-school-closing popmake-overlay auto_open click_open

div.p: School will remain closed until such time as deemed by Governor Murphy and health officials to be safe for classes to resume.

div.div: School Closed on Wednesday June 2, 2020 due to Inclement Weather.
